item.description: Fall is in full swing and we are back at Lavender representing again! NOTE THE TIME CHANGE! 8PM! Everyone pays their own way. In your RSVP, please state if you are just coming for Karaoke at 930. Otherwise, we will see you at 8pm for dinner. I will try to arrange with the waitress that she breaks down the bill individually. The SOX game is at 710, so if you wish to get there in time for the first pitch you may. Ask for Slammer when you get there. They all know me.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in bar area or outside. My pic is posted in my profile.
item.name: Dinner, SOX, and Karaoke IS BACK!
